visual: This is something I need to write
Write to introduce who I am and what I did
But it is not easy to write beautiful words

main: I should write something here about my works.
My working experience is about 6 years.
The companies are all different, and I use different skills.
Anyway, it will take time to write it.

detail.Name: 孫 琮博 (Tsung-Po Sun, そん むねひろ)
detail.得意分野: Web開発(Backend/Frontend)、サービス運用管理、AWS開発、データベース管理、Crawling/Scraping、データ分析
